There’s some discussion on the NixOS discourse of usage of Rust within Nix. Might be interesting to some folks.

https://discourse.nixos.org/t/rust-in-nix-discussion-thread/5092/4
In some related news we with Tweag are working to improve https://github.com/kolloch/crate2nix to a level where it is actually feasible to use it in production.
More on topic: Firefox managed to integrate Rust into C++ codebase without too many issues, didn’t they?

More on topic: Firefox managed to integrate Rust into C++ codebase without too many issues, didn’t they?

That was my understanding - I wasn't sure what the most recent comment was trying to say.
